The Witchwood.name: Zap!
The Witchwood.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
The Witchwood.flavor: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

The Witchwood.name: Blazing Invocation
The Witchwood.text: Discover a Battlecry minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

The Witchwood.name: Chameleos
The Witchwood.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
The Witchwood.flavor: He's everyone you want to be.

The Witchwood.name: Dark Possession
The Witchwood.text: Deal $2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
The Witchwood.flavor: Wanted on three counts of gnomish possession.

The Witchwood.name: Hidden Wisdom
The Witchwood.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, draw 2 cards.
The Witchwood.flavor: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

The Witchwood.name: Snap Freeze
The Witchwood.text: Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, destroy it.
The Witchwood.flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

The Witchwood.name: Swamp Dragon Egg
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Would you eat them in a ditch? Would you eat them with a witch?

The Witchwood.name: Swamp Leech
The Witchwood.text: Lifesteal
The Witchwood.flavor: A face only a druid could love.

The Witchwood.name: Town Crier
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

The Witchwood.name: Witch's Apprentice
The Witchwood.text: Taunt Battlecry: Add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Is she a frog that became a witch, or a witch that became a frog?

The Witchwood.name: Witchwood Apple
The Witchwood.text: Add two 2/2 Treants to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

The Witchwood.name: Witchwood Imp
The Witchwood.text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: This wood imp. Stop asking!

The Witchwood.name: Archmage Arugal
The Witchwood.text: Whenever you draw a minion, add a copy of it to_your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: His worgen children call him Archmage AROO-OO-OO-OO-gal.

The Witchwood.name: Baleful Banker
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: He's gotten big into crypt-o-currency.

The Witchwood.name: Book of Specters
The Witchwood.text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
The Witchwood.flavor: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

The Witchwood.name: Cathedral Gargoyle
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
The Witchwood.flavor: Fly like an eagle, drop like a rock.

The Witchwood.name: Cheap Shot
The Witchwood.text: Echo Deal $2 damage to a_minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: 50% off. Every shot must go!

The Witchwood.name: Curse of Weakness
The Witchwood.text: Echo Give all enemy minions -2_Attack until your next_turn.
The Witchwood.flavor: Warlocks refer to this as a "balance change."

The Witchwood.name: Divine Hymn
The Witchwood.text: Restore #6 Health to all friendly characters.
The Witchwood.flavor: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

The Witchwood.name: Earthen Might
The Witchwood.text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's an Elemental, add
a random Elemental
to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Or it might not.

The Witchwood.name: Ghost Light Angler
The Witchwood.text: Echo
The Witchwood.flavor: BoOooOogrglgrlgrlooOoOoo!

The Witchwood.name: Hunting Mastiff
The Witchwood.text: Echo Rush
The Witchwood.flavor: "Shh! You're going to start a howl!"

The Witchwood.name: Lost Spirit
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1 Attack.
The Witchwood.flavor: She simply refuses to ask for directions.

The Witchwood.name: Pick Pocket
The Witchwood.text: Echo Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
The Witchwood.flavor: He'll pick anyone's pocket, except a gnome's. He'd never stoop so low.

The Witchwood.name: Rat Trap
The Witchwood.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
The Witchwood.flavor: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

The Witchwood.name: Rebuke
The Witchwood.text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
The Witchwood.flavor: When one buke just isn’t enough.

The Witchwood.name: Redband Wasp
The Witchwood.text: Rush Has +3 Attack while damaged.
The Witchwood.flavor: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

The Witchwood.name: Sound the Bells!
The Witchwood.text: Echo Give a minion +1/+2.
The Witchwood.flavor: Weirdly, the bells stop ringing after 5.

The Witchwood.name: Spellshifter
The Witchwood.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: He also goes by "worg-lock."

The Witchwood.name: Squashling
The Witchwood.text: [x]Echo Battlecry: Restore #2 Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: Everyone hail to the squashling song!

The Witchwood.name: Vicious Scalehide
The Witchwood.text: Lifesteal Rush
The Witchwood.flavor: They make wonderful pets if you're not allergic to blood loss.

The Witchwood.name: Warpath
The Witchwood.text: Echo Deal $1 damage to all_minions.
The Witchwood.flavor: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

The Witchwood.name: Woodcutter's Axe
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

The Witchwood.name: Blackwald Pixie
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Refresh your Hero Power.
The Witchwood.flavor: "Oh hi bark."

The Witchwood.name: Blink Fox
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
The Witchwood.flavor: It's like, SUPER bad at staring contests.

The Witchwood.name: Cinderstorm
The Witchwood.text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
The Witchwood.flavor: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

The Witchwood.name: Cutthroat Buccaneer
The Witchwood.text: Combo: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
The Witchwood.flavor: In life he worked as a sword swallower.

The Witchwood.name: Druid of the Scythe
The Witchwood.flavor: She's a scythe for sore eyes.

The Witchwood.name: Duskbat
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
The Witchwood.flavor: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

The Witchwood.name: Duskhaven Hunter
The Witchwood.text: [x]Stealth Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: After a short paws, she's back to herself again.

The Witchwood.name: Face Collector
The Witchwood.text: Echo Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: “I’ll trade you a Malfurion for an Anduin.”

The Witchwood.name: Ferocious Howl
The Witchwood.text:
Draw a card.
Gain 1 Armor for each card in your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?

The Witchwood.name: Fiendish Circle
The Witchwood.text: [x]Summon four 1/1 Imps.
The Witchwood.flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

The Witchwood.name: Hench-Clan Thug
The Witchwood.text: After your hero attacks, give this minion +1/+1.
The Witchwood.flavor: Hard time making ends meet? Hate the League of Explorers? Get a job henching!

The Witchwood.name: Marsh Drake
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Poisonous Drakeslayer for your opponent.
The Witchwood.flavor: She would have gotten away with it, if it weren't for that meddling Drakeslayer.

The Witchwood.name: Nightmare Amalgam
The Witchwood.text: This has all minion types.
The Witchwood.flavor: Be all that you can be.

The Witchwood.name: Paragon of Light
The Witchwood.text: While this minion has 3 or more Attack, it has Taunt and Lifesteal.
The Witchwood.flavor: She’s all fun and games until someone rings that stupid bell.

The Witchwood.name: Phantom Militia
The Witchwood.text: Echo Taunt
The Witchwood.flavor: Recruited from the Gilnean opera house.

The Witchwood.name: Pumpkin Peasant
The Witchwood.text: [x]Lifesteal Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: Time to squash your opponent.

The Witchwood.name: Rabid Worgen
The Witchwood.text: Rush
The Witchwood.flavor: "I'm sorry, son.  We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

The Witchwood.name: Ratcatcher
The Witchwood.text: Rush Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

The Witchwood.name: Ravencaller
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Add two random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: That Friends and Familiars Plan is really paying off!

The Witchwood.name: Tanglefur Mystic
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Add a random 2-Cost minion to each player's hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Doom!  Only doom for you!  But pay good tip, maybe less doom.

The Witchwood.name: Vivid Nightmare
The Witchwood.text:
[x]Choose a friendly minion.
Summon a copy of it with
1 Health remaining.
The Witchwood.flavor: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

The Witchwood.name: Voodoo Doll
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Deathrattle: Destroy the chosen minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: "Aww, I love it! It even kinda looks like me."

The Witchwood.name: Walnut Sprite
The Witchwood.text: Echo
The Witchwood.flavor: How do you make a walnut laugh? Crack it up!

The Witchwood.name: Witch's Cauldron
The Witchwood.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Eye of murloc, ear of bat, foot of Fordring, fur of cat…

The Witchwood.name: Witching Hour
The Witchwood.text: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
The Witchwood.flavor: The gates to the Gilnean pet cemetary MUST remain locked at all times.

The Witchwood.name: Arcane Keysmith
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
The Witchwood.flavor: She sells all manner of keys: from A flat to G sharp.

The Witchwood.name: Bellringer Sentry
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
The Witchwood.flavor: "Who are you? Eh, none of my business."

The Witchwood.name: Blood Witch
The Witchwood.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your_hero.
The Witchwood.flavor: Like a sloppy joe for vampires.

The Witchwood.name: Dire Frenzy
The Witchwood.text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
The Witchwood.flavor: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

The Witchwood.name: Felsoul Inquisitor
The Witchwood.text: Lifesteal Taunt
The Witchwood.flavor: Everyone expects an inquisition reference.

The Witchwood.name: Forest Guide
The Witchwood.text: At the end of your turn, both players draw a card.
The Witchwood.flavor: "Just sign this waiver, and we'll be on our way."

The Witchwood.name: Houndmaster Shaw
The Witchwood.text: Your other minions have Rush.
The Witchwood.flavor: They’re good dogs, Tess.

The Witchwood.name: Lifedrinker
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
The Witchwood.flavor: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

The Witchwood.name: Mad Hatter
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Randomly toss 3 hats to other minions. Each hat gives +1/+1.
The Witchwood.flavor: He's entirely bonkers. All the best goblins are.

The Witchwood.name: Militia Commander
The Witchwood.text: Rush Battlecry: Gain +3_Attack this turn.
The Witchwood.flavor: She only needs two commands: "Heel" and "Sic 'em!"

The Witchwood.name: Mistwraith
The Witchwood.text: Whenever you play an Echo_card, gain +1/+1.
The Witchwood.flavor: One little Mistwraith sitting in a tree. M-I-S-T-I-N-G.

The Witchwood.name: Night Prowler
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If this is the only minion on the battlefield, gain +3/+3.
The Witchwood.flavor: Listen to the mew-sic of the night.

The Witchwood.name: Sandbinder
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental from your deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: The secret is glue.

The Witchwood.name: Scaleworm
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
The Witchwood.flavor: A popular local alternative to bananas.

The Witchwood.name: Spectral Cutlass
The Witchwood.text: [x]Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
The Witchwood.flavor: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

The Witchwood.name: Swift Messenger
The Witchwood.text: [x]Rush Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: Same turn delivery - guaranteed!

The Witchwood.name: The Glass Knight
The Witchwood.text: [x]Divine Shield Whenever you restore Health, gain Divine Shield.
The Witchwood.flavor: She seems scary, but she's got a glass jaw.

The Witchwood.name: Totem Cruncher
The Witchwood.text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy your Totems. Gain +2/+2 for each destroyed.
The Witchwood.flavor: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

The Witchwood.name: Toxmonger
The Witchwood.text: [x]Whenever you play a 1-Cost minion, give it Poisonous.
The Witchwood.flavor: Not all spiders are born poisonous. That's where he comes in.

The Witchwood.name: Unpowered Steambot
The Witchwood.text: Taunt
The Witchwood.flavor: Overpowered Steambot got nerfed.

The Witchwood.name: Vex Crow
The Witchwood.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random
2-Cost minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

The Witchwood.name: WANTED!
The Witchwood.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a Coin to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Wanted: Dead or Undead.

The Witchwood.name: Wing Blast
The Witchwood.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).
The Witchwood.flavor: Emeriss uses Wing Blast.  It's super effective!

The Witchwood.name: Wispering Woods
The Witchwood.text:
[x]Summon a 1/1 Wisp for
each card in your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: We didn't actually fire the guy who named Dark Wispers.

The Witchwood.name: Witchwood Piper
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: She rids villages of annoying pests, like rats and children.

The Witchwood.name: Bewitched Guardian
The Witchwood.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1 Health _for each card in your hand._
The Witchwood.flavor: Amwitched. Beingwitched. Beenwitched.

The Witchwood.name: Bonfire Elemental
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, draw a card.
The Witchwood.flavor: Next step: Marshmallow elementals.

The Witchwood.name: Carrion Drake
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If a minion died this turn, gain Poisonous.
The Witchwood.flavor: Fits easily into overhead luggage bins.

The Witchwood.name: Chief Inspector
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets.
The Witchwood.flavor: Empty your pockets, I know you’ve got a Wandering Monster in there!

The Witchwood.name: Clockwork Automaton
The Witchwood.text: Double the damage and_healing of your Hero_Power.
The Witchwood.flavor: Most mechs are pretty chill, but this one is all wound up.

The Witchwood.name: Curio Collector
The Witchwood.text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.
The Witchwood.flavor: Experts worry that curios are a gateway to face-collecting.

The Witchwood.name: Darius Crowley
The Witchwood.text: [x]Rush After this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
The Witchwood.flavor: You either die a villain, or live long enough to see yourself become the hero.

The Witchwood.name: Deathweb Spider
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, gain Lifesteal.
The Witchwood.flavor: The itsy bitsy spiders climbed up the village wall. Then came the witch and the spiders ate them all.

The Witchwood.name: Dollmaster Dorian
The Witchwood.text: Whenever you draw a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
The Witchwood.flavor: The children were puzzled by the scratches covering the insides of their toy-boxes.

The Witchwood.name: Duskfallen Aviana
The Witchwood.text: On each player's turn, the first card played costs (0).
The Witchwood.flavor: Someone called her "Tweety". She didn't take it well.

The Witchwood.name: Festeroot Hulk
The Witchwood.text: After a friendly minion attacks, gain +1 Attack.
The Witchwood.flavor: Tree puns arboring.

The Witchwood.name: Ghostly Charger
The Witchwood.text: Divine Shield Rush
The Witchwood.flavor: Maybe we should have called him Ghostly Rusher.

The Witchwood.name: Holy Water
The Witchwood.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your_hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

The Witchwood.name: Muck Hunter
The Witchwood.text: Rush Battlecry: Summon two 2/1_Mucklings for your opponent.
The Witchwood.flavor: You think your job mucks.

The Witchwood.name: Prince Liam
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all 1-Cost cards in your deck _into Legendary minions.
The Witchwood.flavor: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

The Witchwood.name: Quartz Elemental
The Witchwood.text: Can't attack while damaged.
The Witchwood.flavor: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

The Witchwood.name: Rotten Applebaum
The Witchwood.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
The Witchwood.flavor: Key ingredient in Gilnean applesauce.

The Witchwood.name: Vilebrood Skitterer
The Witchwood.text: Poisonous Rush
The Witchwood.flavor: It aspires to be a Vilebrood Dancer, but it has eight left feet.

The Witchwood.name: Witchwood Grizzly
The Witchwood.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Lose 1 Health for each card in your opponent's hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: You know what they say about people with big hands? Small bears.

The Witchwood.name: Coffin Crasher
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion from your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Also does weddings.

The Witchwood.name: Cursed Castaway
The Witchwood.text: Rush Deathrattle: Draw a Combo card from your deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: She was an ordinary castaway... until she found that cursed volleyball.

The Witchwood.name: Deadly Arsenal
The Witchwood.text: Reveal a weapon from your deck. Deal its Attack to all minions.
The Witchwood.flavor: Oh look. A Gorehowl.

The Witchwood.name: Glinda Crowskin
The Witchwood.text: Minions in your hand have_Echo.
The Witchwood.flavor:
Summon an unlimited* number of minions!**


*Six
**Wisps

The Witchwood.name: Lady in White
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast 'Inner Fire' _on every minion in your deck_ (set Attack equal to Health).
The Witchwood.flavor: She was a lady in polka dots until the gnomish laundromat incident.

The Witchwood.name: Mossy Horror
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other_minions with 2_or_less_Attack.
The Witchwood.flavor: The hills have eyes. And teeth. Pretty bad breath, too.

The Witchwood.name: Toki, Time-Tinker
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion from the past to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

The Witchwood.name: Azalina Soulthief
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your_opponent's.
The Witchwood.flavor: The cards are always golden on the other side.

The Witchwood.name: Blackhowl Gunspire
The Witchwood.text:
[x]Can't attack. Whenever
this minion takes damage,
deal 3 damage to a
random enemy.
The Witchwood.flavor: The upper windows used to be for aiming. Then we thought: "Hey! MORE cannons!"

The Witchwood.name: Bogshaper
The Witchwood.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a minion from your_deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: The tricky part is getting them to HOLD their shape.

The Witchwood.name: Countess Ashmore
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Rush, Lifesteal, and Deathrattle card from your deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: "1 minion… ah, ah, ah! 2 minions… ah, ah, ah! 3 minions… ah, ah, ah!"

The Witchwood.name: Darkmire Moonkin
The Witchwood.text: Spell Damage +2
The Witchwood.flavor: Birds of a feather Moonfire together.

The Witchwood.name: Furious Ettin
The Witchwood.text: Taunt
The Witchwood.flavor: One head is a morning person. The other head hates morning people.

The Witchwood.name: Lord Godfrey
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions. If any die, repeat this Battlecry.
The Witchwood.flavor: Betrayed the Alliance. Betrayed the Horde. All for 200 achievement points and a sweet, sweet hat.

The Witchwood.name: Nightscale Matriarch
The Witchwood.text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3_Whelp.
The Witchwood.flavor: Everywhelp, get in here!

The Witchwood.name: Tess Greymane
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
The Witchwood.flavor: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

The Witchwood.name: Worgen Abomination
The Witchwood.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all other damaged minions.
The Witchwood.flavor: Does anyone want to play dead!?

The Witchwood.name: Wyrmguard
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
The Witchwood.flavor: They think they're trusted guardians. Dragons think they're convenient snacks.

The Witchwood.name: Cauldron Elemental
The Witchwood.text: Your other Elementals have +2 Attack.
The Witchwood.flavor: Decorating tip: Unused cauldrons can make a lovely elemental display.

The Witchwood.name: Deranged Doctor
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to your hero.
The Witchwood.flavor: Unfortunately, his doctorate is in Murloc Literature.

The Witchwood.name: Gilnean Royal Guard
The Witchwood.text: [x]Divine Shield, Rush Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: Admittedly, they kind of dropped the ball with Prince Liam.

The Witchwood.name: Hagatha the Witch
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
The Witchwood.flavor: Curse-bringer, tree-twister, mother of wretched things…Hanzo main.

The Witchwood.name: Silver Sword
The Witchwood.text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
The Witchwood.flavor: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

The Witchwood.name: Splintergraft
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 10/10 copy to your hand that costs (10).
The Witchwood.flavor: We're going to need some bigger tweezers.

The Witchwood.name: Splitting Festeroot
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Splitting Saplings.
The Witchwood.flavor: No use crying over split Festeroot,

The Witchwood.name: Shudderwock
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat all other Battlecries from cards you played this game (targets chosen randomly).
The Witchwood.flavor: Beware the Shudderwock, my son. We're fresh out of vorpal daggers.

The Witchwood.name: Emeriss
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Double the Attack and Health of all minions in_your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Taste your world's corruption! It tastes like chicken.
